content.query:
SELECT DISTINCT 
     PR.HANDLE AS HD_PRESTADOR
    ,DT.PORTEANESTESICO AS NU_PORTE_ANESTESICO -- PAN
    ,DT.DATAINICIAL AS DT_INICIAL
    ,DT.DATAFINAL AS DT_FINAL
    ,DT.PERCENTUALAUXILIARANESTESISTA AS PERCENTUALAUXILIARANESTESISTA
    ,DT.QTDUSANESTESISTA AS QTDUSANESTESISTA
    ,DT.PERCENTUALPAGTOUS AS PERCENTUALPAGTOUS
    ,VUS.VALORUSHONORARIO AS VALORUSHONORARIO
    ,(DT.QTDUSANESTESISTA*DT.PERCENTUALPAGTOUS*VUS.VALORUSHONORARIO)/100  AS VL_US_ANESTESISTA

FROM PROSTG.SAM_PRESTADOR PR
         JOIN PROSTG.SAM_PRECOPRESTADOR_AN DT ON PR.HANDLE  = DT.PRESTADOR
    LEFT JOIN PROSTG.SAM_TABUS US ON US.HANDLE  = DT.TABELAUS
    LEFT JOIN PROSTG.SAM_TABUS_VLR VUS ON US.HANDLE  = VUS.TABELAUS

WHERE VUS.DATAFINAL IS NULL
